popularityCurve.label: the speed and print quality of the magnum 4 press also won us over

clusterList.phrase: the speed and print quality of the magnum 4 press also won us over

faster speeds were imperative when selecting the new press to extend the capacity within our tight production window to accommodate the new publication we hope that the improved efficiencies will also enhance the company's market position and open up new business opportunities because we will have the production capacity to accommodate a range of new products

we couldn't select a larger press because there simply isn't space for it at 45 000 iph the single-width magnum 4 press provides the ideal productivity and high quality we require in the space we have available
we experienced such amazing reductions in makeready and turn-around time on the qm 46 presses

essentially we are able to do the same amount of work if not more on the two heidelberg printmaster qm 46 presses as we did on the four presses we were using which makes unity printing more competitive in the marketplace and benefits our customers
the qm 46 presses are such a good fit for our company
it prints solids as well as our larger heidelberg presses which is hard to believe when printing on 24-point board
i know people who run the qm 46 and have been very happy as far as the quality for small format it's a tremendous press and it does phenomenal work
the new printer fits with the hard work ethic of the burlington fastsigns team and has the potential to increase the centre's capacity to three times what it was before
the mill's been designed to work a bit smarter and harder as the resource reduces in size you're going to have to work a bit quicker to get the same volume through
